macro.name: READ_POWER_CMD_NUMBER
macro.description: Command number for reading power. The prefix 'IN_PV_' is added automatically. Defaults to 01

macro.name: READ_EXT_TEMP_CMD_NUMBER
macro.description: Command number for reading external temperature. The prefix 'IN_PV_' is added automatically. Defaults to 02

macro.name: READ_HIGH_LIM_CMD_NUMBER
macro.description: Command number for reading the high limit. The prefix 'IN_SP_' is added automatically. Defaults to 01

macro.name: READ_LOW_LIM_CMD_NUMBER
macro.description: Command number for reading the low limit. The prefix 'IN_SP_' is added automatically. Defaults to 02
